test.command: cd "$(dirname "$0")" # Change directory to the script's location export TEST_RESROOT="$(pwd)" # Export TEST_RESROOT as the script's directory export JAVA_OPTS="$JVM_OPTIONS"; cd "$(TEST_RESROOT)/jmh-jdk-microbenchmarks/micros-uber"; bash "$(TEST_RESROOT)/run_jmh_jdk_micros.sh" Parallel 28 5 5 5 5 "$TEST_STATUS"
